body:
## Release Notes

- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#18)
- Migrate from ansi-wl-pprint to prettyprinter. @iphydf (#17)
- Generate simple bindings even if we don't support methods. @iphydf (#16)
- Use `__del__` instead of `__dealloc__`. @iphydf (#15)
- Generate code that cython-lint likes. @iphydf (#14)
- Add correct typings for enter/exit/dealloc. @iphydf (#13)
- Use `check_len` instead of `_check_len`. @iphydf (#12)
- Generate default empty event handlers. @iphydf (#11)
- Add py support for simple value properties and callbacks. @iphydf (#10)
- Generate `${type}_Ptr` classes to wrap C pointers. @iphydf (#9)
- Add parser to infer higher level structure from C API. @iphydf (#8)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#7)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#6)
- Disable targets for cross-compilation. @iphydf (#5)
- Add hacky support for tox_events.h. @iphydf (#4)
- Initial correct generation of tox.h API for Haskell. @iphydf (#3)

## Bug Fixes

- Support strings (like `proxy_host`) in apigen. @iphydf (#19)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Add more descriptive/precise tags to bazel build rules. @iphydf (#20)
name: v0.0.2
